definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: fear, terror—abs. ´[[מ]] Ps 31:14 + 6 t. + Je 20:3 cf. infr.; pl. sf. [[מְגוּרַי]] La 2:22; —fear, terror Is 31:9; = cause of terror Je 20:4; elsewhere in phrase, coined by Jerem., [[מִסָּבִיב]] ´[[מ]] terror on every side Je 6:25, Je 20:3 (where as n.pr.), v:Je 20:10, Je 46:5, Je 49:29, Ps 31:14, La 2:22 (´[[מְגוּרַי מִסּ]]).
